name: AfterLife
overview: Based on John Conway's game of Life, about cellular autmatons, Loadstar #116. This version created by Johnny William Harris aka "The Mad Gamer" and it also included the ability to play the original version on the disk. In it your goal is to attain a population of 15 counters in 200 generations, with 10 seconds per turn and 2 counters per turn. Try to make the culture grow and not shrink. The player can draw patterns and watch how they evolve based on the simple rules of Conway's Game of Life. A cell survives if it has 2 or 3 neighbors only. New cells are born on empty squares with exactly 3 neighbors.
